title: How to Know If You Have Real Friends (And What to Do If You Don't)
description:
What if being lonely were actually a sign of being an interesting, emotionally sincere and thoughtful person? What if, in a world of superficial alliances, lonely was just what a more serious person tended naturally and legitimately to be? 
Our newsletter is a treasury of ideas: ideas that can inspire, console, and improve your mental wellbeing. You’ll also hear news about our app, latest releases and exclusive Q&A content, where we answer your questions: https://www.theschooloflife.com/signup/
For books and more from The School of Life, visit our online shop: https://b4f4.short.gy/q1wYha
Our website has books and articles to help you lead a more fulfilled life: https://b4f4.short.gy/RhyxVU
​​For Psychotherapy and other therapeutic services: https://b4f4.short.gy/RsHpaU 
If you want to keep working on your mental well-being and self-understanding, download our hugely helpful new app now: https://b4f4.short.gy/F467Tc/
For information on The School of Life’s learning and wellbeing
